pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, December 7, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Montréal, Quebec

7:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with National Indigenous Leaders.

Marriott Château Champlain, Habitation B
1050, Rue de la Gauchetière Ouest 

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

8:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the First Ministers and National Indigenous Leaders to discuss supporting the economic development, growth and prosperity of Indigenous communities and businesses.

Marriott Château Champlain, Ballroom
1050, Rue de la Gauchetière Ouest 

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity for accredited media
    • Accredited media are asked to present themselves to ballroom foyer no later than 7:15 a.m.

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister, Minister of Finance Bill Morneau, Minister of Intergovernmental and Northern Affairs and Internal Trade Dominic LeBlanc, Minister of Environment and Climate Change Catherine McKenna and Ambassador of Canada to the United States David MacNaughton will participate in the First Ministers’ Meeting.

Marriott Château Champlain, Ballroom
1050, Rue de la Gauchetière Ouest 

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting for accredited media
    • Accredited media are asked to present themselves to ballroom foyer no later than 9:30 a.m.

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Marriott Château Champlain, Cartier B & C
1050, Rue de la Gauchetière Ouest

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage for accredited media
    • Accredited media are asked to present themselves to ballroom foyer no later than 3:30 p.m.

5:05 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Premier of British Columbia John Horgan.

Marriott Château Champlain, Habitation B
1050, Rue de la Gauchetière Ouest

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
